Headline: #54B South Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54B South Cicero buses are temp rerouted via: Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, Stevenson Expressway, Cicero, due to, street blockage, near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via:  Cicero, 31st, Pulaski, Stevenson Expressway, and Cicero, due to, street blockage, near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.
